title: Oh Thendrale Lyrics Endrendrum Kadhal
stanzas:
ohh thendrale
en thozhil saaya vaa
thaai mannin
paasamellaam
ennodu pesa vaa..(2)

naan nadakkum andha saali
poo udhirkum andha solai
naan nadakkum andha saali
poo udhirkum andha solai
nalangal sollum

idam kaalam maarumpodhum
en paasam maarumaa
idam kaalam maarumpodhum
en paasam maarumaa
thazhuvikollu

kiligal kaanum nerathil
meenakchi niyabagam
kiligal kaanum nerathil
meenakchi niyabagam

en nenjil thavikkum
ninaivai
en kannil midhakkum
kanavai (2)
eduthu sollu.

ohh thendrale
en thozhil saaya vaa
kadhal nenjin
aasai ellaam
unnodu pesa vaa..(2)

seo.title: Oh Thendrale Lyrics Endrendrum Kadhal
seo.description: Get the complete Oh Thendrale Lyrics Endrendrum Kadhal from Endrendrum Kadhal. Read the lyrics penned by Palani Bharathi and composed by Manoj Bhatnagar and sung by Anuradha Sriram. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Palani Bharathi, Endrendrum Kadhal, Manoj Bhatnagar, Anuradha Sriram, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
